title: A Bird's-Eye View On Common Core Across The Country
teaser: With conservative commentator Glenn Beck renewing his fight against the Common Core State Standards, it's worth taking a bird's-eye view of the learning benchmarks. Where are they now being implemented, what challenges remain and what does the coming school year have in store?
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
